page.title: 11Shopping Cont. / Transport.
page.content: big stores in the nearby towns of Port Talbot, Neath and Swansea which are easily reached by regular bus services. E.C. {TRANSPORT:} There are three{bus}services running through the village. Creamline buses journey from the nearby town of Neath and return on the hour three days a week. South Wales transport run a service through Pontrhydyfen between the towns of Swansea and Bridgend every hour and also a service through the village from Neath to Port Talbot and return. There is also a regular bus service between various parts of Cwmavon and the main centre of Port Talbot. All{railways}in the area closed nearly 20 years ago and many of the sites are now popular country walks. S.M.
